channel.title: blog on High-Performance Computing @ UCDavis
channel.description: Recent content in blog on High-Performance Computing @ UCDavis

item.title: Farm Usage Stats
item.description: I recently ran some usage statistics on Farm, our biggest cluster, to get an idea of how it is being used.

item.title: HPC Department Comparisons
item.description: We were curious about what other HPC departments looked like at universities across the USA in terms of staffing versus the amount of hardware managed, so I gathered some information from publicly-available university websites. Here's a chart comparing them.
